itunes:title: Dirt Dishing
title: Dirt Dishing
description:
Join us in this month's Dirt Dishing episode as we explore failed zinnia seeds, dirty fingernails, potato growing methods, pesky weeds, and physical pains.

Join us on Patreon at www.patreon.com/homemakerchicpodcast.   Get free digital copies of our cookbooks, our printable #pitlist, join the Discord call AND the monthly homemaker live stream party when you become a patron of the podcast!

Toups & Co is your one stop shop for all natural and organic skincare and makeup! Visit their site at toupsandco.com to enjoy their line of serums, soaps, lotions, shampoo bars, mineral makeup, lipstick, and more! Use code HOMEMAKER for a discount! 

American Blossom Linens - American Blossom Linens is the bedding that both Shaye and I sleep on and so do many of our listeners. We LOVE our modern vintage sheets made from Texas-grown cotton… no dyes, no imported fabrics here - turn your bedroom into an organic, chic oasis by using the promo code HOMEMAKERCHIC20, and get an exclusive 20% off discount just for listening to the show. www.Americanblossomlinens.com

CUE THE WINE MUSIC! Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines. Dry Farms is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, naturally and traditionally made wines. “Better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly. Drink Dry Farm Wines with Ang and Shaye! Shop and Sip at: https://bit.ly/ ryFarmWinewithHomemakerChic
